title: G4MF File Reference
description: A reference to a self-contained file, such as an image or model. The file's data may be embedded in the G4MF file or referenced externally.

bufferView.description: The index of the buffer view that contains the file data. This is a reference to a buffer view in the G4MF file's buffer views array.

mimeType.description: The MIME type, or media type, of the file, which defines the format of the file. This is required and has no default value.

uri.description: The relative URI to the file. This URI is relative to the G4MF file's location.
